Only the sequence number (nnnnn) is required to be input. The Application will automatically generate the prefix (SCCGTI) and the first 5 digits (yyddd) and attach the sequence number. The sequence number may be either User or System generated.

10 Numeric characters, prefixed by SCCGTI, ie. SCCGTIyydddnnnnn. yy = year (eg. 85 = 1985), ddd = julian day (ie. 01/jan = 001, 02/Jan = 002, 01/Feb = 032, etc.), nnnnn = transaction sequence number (in the range, 00001 to 99999.).
Mandatory Input.

A valid record from SECURITY.TRANS. If the transaction has already been added to CG.TXN.BASE then the details will populate the record and allow changes to the transaction nominal, cost, expenses or accrued interest. If the transaction has not updated the base then the user will be able to enter as many sets of transaction details as required to provide the correct capital gains tax breakdown.
